video.title: Power Rangers: Megaforce
video.synopsis: When Earth is threatened by a massive alien invasion, the planet's supernatural guardian calls upon five teenagers to form the ultimate defense team.

episodes.synopsis: When malicious aliens make their way to Earth's orbit, Gosei decides to form a new team of teenage heroes to defend the planet.
episodes.title: Mega Mission

episodes.synopsis: The alien invaders send Scaraba, an alien scientist, down to Earth to study the human race and determine how best to defeat them.
episodes.title: He Blasted Me With Science

episodes.synopsis: When Noah has trouble lifting Jake's heavy weapon he begins to doubt his abilities, but he learns that believing in yourself is all that's necessary.
episodes.title: Going Viral

episodes.synopsis: As the Rangers learn that concentration is essential to perfecting their skills, they are distracted by a civilian falsely claiming to be a Ranger.
episodes.title: Stranger Ranger

episodes.synopsis: Best friends Gia and Emma are turned into bitter enemies by a vicious monster, Beezara, which also turns the guys into drone slaves.
episodes.title: United We Stand

episodes.synopsis: When a monster attacks the city with music that produces pain, the Rangers must fight back in an unorthodox way with a song of their own.
episodes.title: Harmony and Dizchord

episodes.synopsis: After Troy deals with some small-minded bullies at school, the Rangers square off against a more dangerous bully, Creepox.
episodes.title: Who's Crying Now?

episodes.synopsis: The mysterious Robo Knight joins the Power Rangers. Can he help them defeat toxic monsters that threaten the earth?
episodes.title: Robo Knight

episodes.synopsis: While the Rangers are unsure about how to work with the newly-arrived Robo Knight, Vrak captures the robotic Ranger in an attempt to reprogram him.
episodes.title: Prince Takes Knight

episodes.synopsis: When a shadow-stealing monster attacks, the Rangers must teach Robo Knight the power of teamwork in order to defeat him.
episodes.title: Man and Machine

episodes.synopsis: The Rangers must find and retrieve a powerful ancient weapon known as the Wild Sword, but Vrak is determined to harness its power for himself.
episodes.title: Ultra Power

episodes.synopsis: When Gia and the other Rangers are captured by a monster who feeds on human laughter, it's up to no-nonsense duo Noah and Robo Knight to save them.
episodes.title: Last Laugh

episodes.synopsis: A dream-snatching monster preys on Emma and other humans, eating away their ambitions, and the Rangers must defeat the creature before Emma is lost.
episodes.title: Dream Snatcher

episodes.synopsis: When Bluefur and Bigs use the Aurora box to become even more powerful, Gosei and the Power Rangers must pull out all the stops to defeat them.
episodes.title: Gosei Ultimate

episodes.synopsis: The Power Rangers encounter their first Robotic opponents, who try to convince Robo Knight that humans are the true danger to the Earth.
episodes.title: The Human Factor

episodes.synopsis: When one of Metal Alice's robots malfuntions, Emma and the Power Rangers decide to adopt it and teach it the values of friendship and freedom.
episodes.title: Rico the Robot

episodes.synopsis: The Power Rangers must race to save the day when Metal Alice plots to throw the city into chaos by derailing a crowded passenger train.
episodes.title: Staying on Track

episodes.synopsis: Admiral Malkor awakens from his cocoon stronger than ever and determined to destroy the Power Rangers.
episodes.title: The Human Condition

episodes.synopsis: The Rangers' victory over the Warstar aliens is short-lived when they discover Metal Alice has turned Vrak into a powerful and menacing cyborg.
episodes.title: The Messenger

episodes.synopsis: When Cyborg Vrak, Metal Alice and the Messenger launch a vicious attack against the Power Rangers, it will take all their powers to save the Earth.
episodes.title: End Game
